Text.val: 25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
23.03.2011 GB SCR116261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
14.07.2008 EMB SCR12482 Changed direct SQL statement. Insert into contains
field names now.
04.04.2006 SH SCR10790 BXA004B Added <header_id>
12.04.2005 SH SCR8137 BXA004B added new tag <expiry_date>
03.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed and added new parameters, relevant for BXA900
, also changed the argument list for BXA900
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
29.01.2004 AS removed lil_ from lim_type (parameter report type for BXA900)
23.01.2004 SH SCR5159 Added new fields where REPA will be stored
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
01.12.2003 SH SCR4712 Added two new paras PI.ONLYPOSLIMITS and
- PI.LIMITTYPE, extended selection of DEBC regarding to the new paras and
- changed the contens of some tags, see SCR for details
20.11.2003 SH SCR4710 Moved the call to delete TX04 rows outside of BLOCK
- v.ReturnCode UFB523 > 0, to perform the deletion of TX04 rows
27.08.2003 AS SCR4199 added DEBC_DATDELETED IS NULL to Where clause
of task BXA004T004 CreateTX04
04.08.2003 SH SCR3998 Enlarged the pictures of some virtuals, because after
- stripping of the contents, with UFB535, the pictures of the virtuals were to
- small and the contents cut at the end
21.03.2003 SH SCR2766 Removed task "delete TCOD" will be done now in the night
- program
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
04.12.2002 SCR2651 SH Add new parameter PI_Printerqueue and add to list of
- argumernts for BXA900
25.11.2002 AS implemented major changes due to performance problems in Merge
module which occur when XML gets big. Debtor part of BXA004 is now
generated in chunks of n debtors each
22.10.2002 SH SCR2393 Add new argument to end of list for call to BXA900
10.10.2002 AS, replaced CALLPROG()s to UFB535 by CALL PROG op.
18.09.2002 SCR2115 SH Only if PI.SEQUENCE = 1 move 0 to PI.SEQUENCE for BXA900
05.09.2002 SCR2102 Disabled call to UFB532
25.07.2002 SCR1685 SH Added new parameter pi_onlybalance and extended
- selection of DEBC rows with DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0 only if parameter = 'Y'
22.07.2002 SCR1720 SH Rebuilt loop over DEBC with DSQL to use a dynamic
- sequence order (If PI.SEQUENCE <>2 ->DEBC_DEBH / PI.SEQUENCE = 2 -> DEBC_DEBC
- and I added also the check to DEBC_DATDELETED = null, according to the SPECS
05-JUL-2002 AS added parameter pi_usernotify which is the user(0) who should get
a notification message if report generation is finished ...
30.04.2002 SH SCR95 Wrap any output with UFB535, to replace special XML-Charater
24.04.2002 SH SCR759 Implemented errorhandling and a proper handling of
- directories for Templates and Outputfiles
-changed public name to BXA004A (as per specification)
-changed parameters to Alpha to support call through GB701
-16.04 assigned type to par
07.03.2002 SH SCR952 Set Allow Event to 'N', all tasks
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
-- things we need fro GNRL, fetched in BXA004T002
-- things we nedd from CLIENT, fetched in BXA004T003
try tor read chunk-size from .ini (default: 1000)
// for debugging purposes we might want to keep the temp. files
// here we have a logical name MERGE_DEBUG for.
-- 05.09.2002 SCR2102 SH Do not check parameters because most of them are
-- optinal --> Could be deleted in the future if it's sure that the check never
-- used
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
we have a journal number. Now we can set the filenames ...
Set text for reporttype
copy the header file to final file. If we don't do that, AS/400 will choose
system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later on append with cat >>
to a non-existing (new) final file ...
Set the name of the view which we use to get the debtors. We have two!
See BXA004T004 for details and explanantion ...
Set add sql-where if pi_onlyposlimits = TRUE and pi_limittype = C/F
Set chunk numbers in TX04 to allow partial XML files for debtors and thereby
avoid performance problems in merge module when XML files get big ...
Generate chunks of debtor XML information (and concatenate these) ...
The debtor part has already been appended to the final (temp) file in ChunkLoop
Now we can append the footer
copy final file to TaminoQueue's pickup directory
delete TX04 records generated during this run
delete temp. files ...

ExpSyntax.val: 'copying final file to TaminoQ pickup directory'

Text.val: -- Uses LinkQuery to get additional fields from table DEBC, if the performance
decreases too much, then the temp table see above, and maybe the related
views have to be extended with the DEBC fields, see below
10-OCT-2002 AS, introduced virtuals to get rid of CALLPROG() in Merge expression
TODO: add model information

SQL_STMT_U.val: INSERT INTO :1/TX04 ( BXA004_SEQNO, BXA004_BULK, BXA004_RECNO, DEBC_NO, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DATDELETED, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_CLCURR, DEBC_OWNJUDGLIMIT, DEBC_CREDITLIMITDATE, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE1, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE2, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE3, DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_NAME2, DEBH_HADR_ADDRESS, DEBH_HADR_ZIP, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1, DEBC_FINANCELIMIT, DEBC_FINANCELIMITCURR, DEBC_FINANCELIMITDATE, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE1FINLIM, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE2FINLIM, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE3FINLIM) SELECT :2 AS NSEQ, 0 AS BULKC, 0 AS RECNO, DEB.* FROM :1/:3 DEB WHERE DEBC_ADMNO=:4 AND DEBC_CLNTNO=:5 AND DEBC_DATDELETED IS NULL :6

Text.val: // DSQL task which fills temp. table TX04 with data.
// Note:
// If pi.onlybalance<>'Y', we are only interested in "active" debtors. These are
// e.g. debtors which have a DEBB record with DEBB.ACTINVAH<>0
// Therefore we have two diffent views:
// V_BXA004_01 which is used for pi.onlybalance='N'
// V_BXA004_02 which is used for pi.onlybalance='Y' and additionaly joins DEBB
// and has DEBB.ACTINVAH<>0 in the WHERE clause
06-DEC-2002 AS, SCR #2663, rage was missing here (-> SQL Where)
// this tasks loops over the TX04 records inserted in BXA004T004
// It uses the sort which is selected in pi.sequence and updates all
// bulk numbers (chunks)
// deletes the TX04 records generated during this run ...
